name: A Kid's Nightmare
description:
(I recommend to download the game instead of playing in the browser if you can, because the light doesn't work properly from a certain distance)

This game was made for the 41st Ludum Dare with the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

This is a horror game for, and with the point of view, of a kid.

You wake up suddenly in the middle of the night in your room after a nightmare... But are you really awake ? This room seems pretty hostile in the dark. You have to find your way to the light.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/a-kids-nightmare
